Org UI

Basics
Components

Button

Button is one of popular component to trigger events including links via the anchor tags.

Basic

Link
<button class="ouiButton">Button</button>
<a href="#" class="ouiButton">Link</a>

Color variation

<button class="ouiButton isPrimary">Primary</button>
<button class="ouiButton isSuccess">Success</button>
<button class="ouiButton isDanger">Hazard</button>
<button class="ouiButton isWarning">Warning</button>

Color variation

<button class="ouiButton isDisabled">Primary</button>
<button class="ouiButton isPrimary isDisabled">Primary</button>
<button class="ouiButton isSuccess isDisabled">Success</button>
<button class="ouiButton isHazard isDisabled">Hazard</button>
<button class="ouiButton isWarning isDisabled">Warning</button>
